All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractCrudRepository<T,ID>
Abstract implementation of a CRUD repository, providing generic methods for persisting and retrieving entities from a database using JDBI.
AbstractQuestCacheService<T>
Abstract class providing caching functionality for quests.
Answer
Represents an answer to a quiz question.
AnswerRepository
Repository interface for managing Answer entities.
AnswerRepositoryImpl
Implementation of the AnswerRepository interface using JDBI for database operations.
AnswersDto
A Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a collection of answers submitted by a player.
App
 
AppConfig
Configuration class for setting up the application context and managing beans.
Converter<T,U>
A generic interface for converting a list of objects of one type to a list of another type.
CrudRepository<T,ID>
Generic interface for CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations.
DifficultyLevel
An enumeration representing the difficulty levels of quests.
FromPlayerWithStatisticToPlayerData
Interface for converting a list of PlayerWithStatistic objects into PlayerData objects.
FromPlayerWithStatisticToPlayerDataImpl
Implementation of the FromPlayerWithStatisticToPlayerData interface, responsible for converting a list of PlayerWithStatistic entities into a list of PlayerData.
FromQuestWithAnswerToQuestData
Interface for converting a list of QuestWithAnswer objects into QuestData objects.
FromQuestWithAnswerToQuestDataImpl
Implementation of the FromQuestWithAnswerToQuestData interface, responsible for converting a list of QuestWithAnswer entities into QuestData objects.
GameService
Interface representing the game service, providing functionalities for generating quests and checking answers.
GameServiceImpl
Implementation of the GameService interface, providing methods for generating quests and checking answers.
Player
Represents a player in the application.
PlayerData
Represents a player's data, including their statistics and identification details.
PlayerDto
A Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a player with their ID and login information.
PlayerRepository
Repository interface for managing Player entities.
PlayerRepositoryImpl
Implementation of the PlayerRepository interface using JDBI for database operations.
PlayerService
Interface representing the player service, providing functionalities for managing player data and statistics.
PlayerServiceImpl
Implementation of the PlayerService interface, providing methods for managing players, including adding, removing, and retrieving player statistics.
PlayersWithStatisticsRepository
Repository interface for managing PlayerWithStatistic entities.
PlayersWithStatisticsRepositoryImpl
Implementation of the PlayersWithStatisticsRepository interface for managing player statistics.
PlayerWithStatistic
Represents a player along with their associated statistics.
Quest
Represents a quest in the application.
QuestCacheService<T>
Interface for a quest cache service that manages cached quests grouped by a specified key type.
QuestData
Represents the data of a quest, including its question, answers, and difficulty level.
QuestDifficultyLevelCacheServiceImpl
Implementation of QuestCacheService for caching quests based on their difficulty levels.
QuestDto
A Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a quest with its details, including the question, difficulty level, and possible answers.
QuestRepository
Repository interface for managing Quest entities.
QuestRepositoryImpl
Implementation of the QuestRepository interface for managing quests.
QuestService
Interface for managing quests in the application.
QuestServiceImpl
Implementation of the QuestService interface, providing functionalities for managing quests.
QuestWithAnswer
Represents a quest along with its associated answer.
QuestWithAnswerRepository
Repository interface for managing QuestWithAnswer entities.
QuestWithAnswerRepositoryImpl
Implementation of the QuestWithAnswerRepository interface for managing quests with their associated answers.
Statistic
Represents a player's statistic record.
StatisticRepository
Repository interface for managing Statistic entities.
StatisticRepositoryImpl
Implementation of the StatisticRepository interface for managing player statistics.
